title: Progeny
alt: I tell my children 'it's not whether you win or lose, it's how you play the game.' I'm trying to take the edge off their competitive drive to ensure that I can always beat them.
transcript:
[Cueball sits at a computer; Megan stands behind him.]
Cueball: Wow â€” researchers taught a computer to beat the world's best humans at yet another task. Does our species have anything left to be proud of?
Megan: Well, it sounds like we're pretty awesome at teaching.
Cueball: Huh? What good is that?
